  
BOOLEAN LITERAL RESULT ELEMENT
<TH checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></TH> 

COPY-OF XML:
<xslTutorial>  
 
NOT an HTML ELEMENT
<bAtt checked="checked" compact="compact" declare="declare" defer="defer" disabled="disabled" ismap="ismap" multiple="multiple" nohref="nohref" noresize="noresize" noshade="noshade" nowrap="nowrap" readonly="readonly" selected="selected"></bAtt>

AN HTML EMPTY ELEMENT INSIDE SPAN, DOES HAVE BOOLEAN ATTRIBUTES
<span><input checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></span>

ALL BOOLEAN ATTRIBUTES ON ELEMENTS THAT HAVE SOME BOOLEAN ATTRIBUTES

<input Checked cOmpact deClare DEFER disabled ismap mUltiple nohref Noresize noshadE Nowrap readOnly selecteD>
<MENU checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></MENU>
<DIR checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></DIR>
<DL checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></DL>
<OL checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></OL>
<UL checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></UL>
<object checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></object> <script checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></script> <button checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></button>
<optgroup checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></optgroup>
<option checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></option>
<select checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></select> <textarea checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></textarea> <img checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected>
<AREA checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected>
<FRAME checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected>
<HR checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected>
<TD checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></TD>
<TH checked compact declare defer disabled ismap multiple nohref noresize noshade nowrap readonly selected></TH>

ELEMENTS THAT DO NOT HAVE BOOLEAN ATTRIBUTES

<COL checked="checked" compact="compact" declare="declare" defer="defer" disabled="disabled" ismap="ismap" multiple="multiple" nohref="nohref" noresize="noresize" noshade="noshade" nowrap="nowrap" readonly="readonly" selected="selected">
<OL>
<LI checked="checked" compact="compact" declare="declare" defer="defer" disabled="disabled" ismap="ismap" multiple="multiple" nohref="nohref" noresize="noresize" noshade="noshade" nowrap="nowrap" readonly="readonly" selected="selected"></LI>
</OL>
</xslTutorial>
